Negative qualitative urine pregnancy test . 12 . Per participant report , use effective method contraception enrollment ; hormonal method ( except vaginal ring ) use continuously past 30 day ; intrauterine device ( IUD [ copper hormonal ] insert least 30 day prior enrollment ) ; female sterilization ; abstinent sexual activity male partner past 30 day ; sexual activity vasectomize partner ; willingness use effective method contraception completion final schedule study visit enrol . 13 .
